# Preface {.unnumbered}

This handbook is a guide on the design, development, training, and implementation of the **Seychelles Oncology Unit Patient Survey**. This handbook was first put together for the first iteration of the survey in 2025.

This is a pre-release version (**v0.0.0.9000**) released on **`r format(Sys.Date(), format = "%d %B %Y")`**.
